feed.title: Many Notes Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.3.0
entry.content:
New features

  • Add Templates feature allowing consistent note formatting
  • Add Help section to main menu
  • Add Toast messages to show notifications on the frontend
  • Add the edit profile feature
  • Add the edit password feature

Other

  • Fix name collision with different file extensions
  • Lazy-load the tree view component
  • Remove soft deletes
  • Update all dependencies
  • Improve markdown editor
  • CSS fixes and improvements
  • Improve readme

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.3.1
New release for Many Notes: v0.3.2
New release for Many Notes: v0.4.0
entry.content:
Features - OAuth: Now supporting authentication via Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google, GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, and Slack - Vaults in file system: A complete copy of all Vaults is now saved on the file system in addition to the database

Other - The instructions now recommend using SQLite and bind mounts instead of MariaDB and Docker volumes - Vault names and file names now support accents and require an alphanumeric character or an underscore as the first character

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.4.1
